name: Elvish Short Sword +1
desc: This magic weapon has a +1 enhancement bonus to attack and damage. It was forged and enchanted by the Western Elves during the early years of the world. It is known to give courage to those who wield the sword.

name: Letter to Volt
desc:
Volt,

I will keep my oath to you when this battle is over and you have taken care of Zorn. I, being his second in command, will then become King of Charn and you will be my councilor. The day is almost upon us. Be ready.

Verto

You should definitely hold on to this as evidence against Verto.

name: Jail Key
desc: This key looks important.

name: Melia's Healing Kit
desc: Melia's healing kit

name: Item List
desc: A list of items for the search and rescue team.

name: Rescue Items
desc: The items for the search and rescue team.

name: Letter to Tindra
desc:
A love letter to Tindra,

\"...Your eyes are more radiant then all the stars. Our love for each other is that of legends. Patience my love, for presently we shall be together as King and Queen...\"

Signed...

\"Captivated by your beauty, Verto\"

You should probably keep this as evidence if there is foul play involved.

name: Volt's Key
desc: This key looks important.

name: Lanterna History
desc:
This is a complete History of Lanterna. You are very familiar with this book since you have studied it in school. Here are the main events...

-After leaving Charn, Elos led them to this new world. \"Them\" were Derik and Elee Wendur and their four daughters and daughter's husbands.

-They, along with the other races, began to create the city of Charn.

-Elos created the Living Tree in the center of town. This tree would extend the life of a human who partook of its fruit once a year. The average life expectancy was around 250 years.

-The Mountain Dwarves live near by in the mountains and the Wood Elves and Talking Beast spread out over the land. There are many other good races brought here by Elos.

-over 20 years ago, the last of the son of Derik passed away. Zorn the Eldest son of Valdur, wanted to become king of Charn. Since Valdur was the eldest son-in-law of Derik, Zorn felt it was his right to be King. Elos had set up a government of judges, saying that Charn should never have a king if they wanted to keep their freedom.

-The people of Charn rejected Zorn's idea of setting up a monarchy. He and his followers plotted to take over the town, but were discovered and banished forever.

-Since then, people who ventured into the forest would sometimes disappear.

-Your parents were some of those who disappeared. You have since been taking care of your younger sister by working at the docks.

name: Letter to Verto
desc:
Verto,

I grow tired of being Zorn's messenger and jail keeper. Be prepared, for the battle begins ere long.

Volt

name: Lily's Ring
desc: This ring has a family name etched into it. The ring seems to have some faint aura of magic to it, but maybe only the rightful owner can unlock it.

name: Lily's Ring of Power
desc:
This ring has Lily's family name etched into it. The ring has a strong aura of magic to it as Lily has revealed its true nature.
+2 AC
+2 Intelligence
+5 SP regeneration per round of combat

name: Mace of Stunning
desc:
A large magical two handed mace that has a 50% chance to stun the target on a successful hit with a saving throw check.
+1 attack
+1 damage

name: Two Handed Sword of the Defender
desc:
Large two handed blade with magical properties.
+1 attack
+1 damage
+2 AC

name: Poison Dagger
desc: dagger of standard construction that also causes an additional 1-2 point(s) for 3 rounds of poison damage on a successful hit.
